thread.section_title: Taj 51 Buckingham Gate Suites and Residences - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent Service, Great Location
thread.title_full: Excellent Service, Great Location - Review of Taj 51 Buckingham Gate Suites and Residences, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: VikasMG
title: Excellent Service, Great Location
text: This is one of the best Taj hotels anywhere. While the site does not allow meaningful views from several rooms, the quality of the hotel and service helps you easily overlook that and the location, convenient to so much in London, is wonderful.
